promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong elephant normal-type pokemon with white skin. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Tuskolith, a a massive strong elephant normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Leek Slap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "normal" or "Tuskolith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, elephant-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Behemoth of the Savanna, its tusks carve terrain with ease. Watch as this peace-loving titan gently slaps away foes with its trusty leek!
